txt.en: 'Indeed, I can provide the fastenings you need. If these horns will aid in our defence, I do so gladly!'
'Your assistance has been most welcome, [placeholder]! Thank you.'
Horns for Battle
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder]. This will see much use during the siege, I am certain.'
'Have you something for me?'
Collected metal fastenings from Rymenhild
'Thank you, friend... I did not relish standing guard out here with no way of sounding the alarm!'
Collected pieces of leather ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Have you something for me?'
Collected aurochs-ivory ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Offram has provided the ivory you need. Rymenhild can be found in the northern part of Eaworth. Leather can be found near the Vendor Hall in Eaworth.\n\nOffram wants you to collect the ivory, fastenings, and leather needed to craft battle-horns for the guards of Eaworth.
'Guarding the outskirts of the city like this with no battle-horn was a frightening thought... my thanks!'

The Quartermaster's workbench is outside the Mead Hall of Eaworth.\n\nOffram asked you to take the materials you collect to the Quartermaster's workbench and craft battle-horns for the guards of Eaworth.
'Have you something for me?'
The guards can be found throughout the city of Eaworth in the Entwash Vale.\n\nOffram asked you to deliver the battle-horns you crafted to the guards of Eaworth.
Offram stands guard outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth.\n\nYou should let Offram know that you have delivered the battle-horns to the guards of Eaworth.
Collect metal fastenings from Rymenhild
Collect pieces of leather ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect aurochs-ivory ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Craft battle-horns for the guards of Eaworth
Deliver battle-horns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Delivered battle-horns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Offram outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth
'This horn is a great boon, [placeholder]. Thank you!'
'Have you something for me?'
'I thought it unwise for Lady TÃ³la's guard to be without a means for calling for aid. Thank you!'
'Have you something for me?'
Offram is decidedly pleased with your hunting prowess and your offering of meat, hides, and ivory. He has more tasks for you.

'[placeholder], the aurochs-ivory you brought me is of great use. Our guards and warriors will have need of battle-horns as we enter the terrible siege.

'Take this ivory to the supplier's workbench outside the Mead Hall and craft some horns. You will also need fastenings and leather bands. Rymenhild in the northern part of the city can provide the fastenings. The leather you will need to collect may be found near the Vendor Hall.

'When you have crafted the battle-horns, deliver them to the guards throughout the city, then return to me.'
